response.original_title: Rad Dude’s Guide to Love and Manhood
response.overview: At a Valentine's Day party, Mikey Maverick has only one goal: To get as much attention as possible, no matter the cost. But when he begins to make the party hell on Earth for all involved, Mikey is forced to finally face his emotions head on.
response.tagline: The bravest*, most powerful** story ever told.
response.title: Rad Dude’s Guide to Love and Manhood
